TITLE GOES HERE:   Use the `dbConnect_scidb` function to connect to the `airlines` database to answer the following problem.
List the airline and flight number for all flights between LAX and JFK on September 26th, 2016.

<!--begin-answer-->

```{sql, connection=mdsr::dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "airlines")}
SELECT carrier, flight 
FROM flights 
WHERE Year = 2016 AND Month = 9 AND day = 26 
  AND Origin IN ("LAX", "JFK") 
  AND Dest IN ("LAX", "JFK")
LIMIT 0,6
```
<!--end-answer-->
